text: phir kya vah vyakti jo apane rab ke ek spasht pramaan par hai aur svayan usake roop mein bhee ek gavaah usake saath-saath rahata hai - aur isase pahale moosa kee kitaab bhee ek maargadarshak aur dayaaluta ke roop mein upasthit rahee hai- (aur vah jo prakaash evan maargadarshan se vanchit hai, donon baraabar ho sakate hai) aise hee log usapar eemaan laate hai, kintu in girohon mein se jo usaka inakaar karega to usake lie jis jagah ka vaada hai, vah to aag hai. atah tumhen isake vishay mein koee sandeh na ho. yah tumhaare rab kee or se saty hai, kintu adhikatar log maanate nahin
